317.name: Text2
317.savedTextString:
This is a version of the ColorGame that uses server-side Z3 for solving constraints. Depending on your connection to lively-kernel.org and the load on the server, this may be very fast or very slow. If you run this locally, it will only work on a current 64-bit Linux (Ubuntu 13.04 is a good candidate.)

See the ColorGame help for explanation.
